relation: NBA Jam: Tournament Edition Player Editor

TOSS (To Sega Saturn) converts graphic files to Saturn’s .CEL, .MAP and .PAL files. TOSS supports 256-color .BMP, .LBM, .PCX, and .TGA thru the Allegro library. Optionally, it can create a .TEX file, useful for sprites.
This is an editor for Power Blade for the NES. Supports editing of all stages and a password generator. It will be unknown if this project will continue.
TIM file format PSX graphic ripper and reinserter. (Source included)
This program extracts/inserts data compressed with the Bios’ LZ77 compression. It can extract directly from an address or you can feed it a VBA SWI-log.
This editor is made for Contra for the NES. You can almost edit all levels, except level 2 and 4 and only the level elements.

Solar Magic Advance, also known before as SMA4 e-Card Maker. It can make e-Reader Cards Data for SMA4 : Power-Up Cards, Switch Cards, Demo Cards… It’s also the first Level Card Viewer. It can also edit SMA4 Saves to change number of live….
One of the only psx assemblers out there. It builds psx exe files using assembly code.

One of the only psx assemblers out there. It builds psx exe files and raw binaries using assembly code. This is an unofficial build by Gemini which should fix the “Load error: no DOS memory” error once and for all.

Feel the need to edit the players and team rosters in NBA Jam: TE? Well you’re in luck because this little program allows exactly that. Features: Edits the players’ stats both “visual” and actual “in-game"….
Here is a level editor for Super Contra. Please refer to the readme before editing your ROM.

The SOALEditor is a game editor for the Gamecube game Skies of Arcadia Legends. The current version allows basic modification of Armor, Weapons, Accessories, Consumable Items, Magic, and Super Moves. It also has a dialog editor and a texture v….

“Cheat patcher” - just program name. It’s not only cheat utility. Program writes any data to the game file selected by the user. With this you can create hack patch, wherein the user himself select final modification of game. De….

A level editor for the NES game Karnov. Supports both the US and Japanese versions. This editor only works with certain bad dumps of the ROM. The only two versions of Karnov I could get to work with this editor are: Karnov (J) [b1] [o1] Karno….
DINO CRISIS 2 FILE TOOL Version 0.4 Program for work files Dino Crisis 2
A tool to extract instrument definitions from Nitro Composer (”SDAT”) archives.

GameHeader is for decoding and displaying the “registration data” section of a rom file. For a game to be granted a license, Nintendo required that publishers write informational values in a reserved area of the rom. This process started wi….
A G.I. Joe Level Editor. Version 0.4.1 fixes the capability to edit stages 2 and above.

FamiTracker is a free windows tracker for producing music for the NES/Famicom-systems. The interface is based on MadTracker and should be easy to use if you’ve been using trackers before. One of the features is NSF-file exporting. That allows….
This is a text extractor/insertor for Mac OS X. It is a PPC Carbon application, but it runs under Rosetta. Source is included.
Batdance is a level editor for Batman.
